message.content:
Create a compelling marketing landing page for the dating platform at C:/Users/joshl/dating-platform/marketing/

The product is sold on AI Solutions Store for $2,499 as a white-label dating platform solution.

Create:
1. marketing/landing-page/index.html - Standalone HTML landing page with:
   - Hero section with gradient background and mockup placeholder
   - Key features: AI-powered matching, real-time chat, Llama AI integration, payment processing, admin dashboard
   - Pricing section ($2,499 one-time)
   - Testimonials section (placeholder)
   - Call-to-action buttons
   - Modern, professional design using inline CSS
   
2. marketing/copy/taglines.md - 20+ catchy taglines for the dating platform
3. marketing/copy/social-posts.md - 30+ social media posts for Twitter/Instagram
4. marketing/copy/email-welcome.md - Welcome email sequence (3 emails)

Make it conversion-focused and professional. Use a purple/pink gradient theme matching dating apps.

input.content:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>White-Label Dating Platform | Launch Your Own Dating App Today</title>
    <meta name="description" content="Launch your own AI-powered dating platform in days, not months. Complete white-label solution with real-time chat, AI matching, and payment processing.">
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@400;500;600;700;800&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    <style>
        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }

        body {
            font-family: 'Inter', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, sans-serif;
            line-height: 1.6;
            color: #1a1a2e;
            overflow-x: hidden;
        }

        /* Navigation */
        .nav {
            position: fixed;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            right: 0;
            z-index: 1000;
            padding: 1rem 2rem;
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95);
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
            box-shadow: 0 2px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
        }

        .nav-container {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
        }

        .logo {
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            font-weight: 800;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 50%, #f093fb 100%);
            -webkit-background-clip: text;
            -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
            background-clip: text;
        }

        .nav-links {
            display: flex;
            gap: 2rem;
            align-items: center;
        }

        .nav-links a {
            text-decoration: none;
            color: #4a4a6a;
            font-weight: 500;
            transition: color 0.3s ease;
        }

        .nav-links a:hover {
            color: #764ba2;
        }

        .btn {
            display: inline-block;
            padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem;
            border-radius: 50px;
            text-decoration: none;
            font-weight: 600;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            cursor: pointer;
            border: none;
            font-size: 1rem;
        }

        .btn-primary {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%);
            color: white;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.4);
        }

        .btn-primary:hover {
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 6px 25px rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.5);
        }

        .btn-secondary {
            background: white;
            color: #764ba2;
            border: 2px solid #764ba2;
        }

        .btn-secondary:hover {
            background: #764ba2;
            color: white;
        }

        .btn-large {
            padding: 1rem 2.5rem;
            font-size: 1.1rem;
        }

        /* Hero Section */
        .hero {
            min-height: 100vh;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 50%, #f093fb 100%);
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            padding: 8rem 2rem 4rem;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
        }

        .hero::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: -50%;
            right: -20%;
            width: 80%;
            height: 150%;
            background: radial-gradient(ellipse, rgba(255,255,255,0.1) 0%, transparent 70%);
            pointer-events: none;
        }

        .hero-container {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
            gap: 4rem;
            align-items: center;
        }

        .hero-content {
            color: white;
        }

        .hero-badge {
            display: inline-block;
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
            padding: 0.5rem 1rem;
            border-radius: 50px;
            font-size: 0.875rem;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
        }

        .hero h1 {
            font-size: 3.5rem;
            font-weight: 800;
            line-height: 1.1;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
        }

        .hero p {
            font-size: 1.25rem;
            opacity: 0.9;
            margin-bottom: 2rem;
            max-width: 500px;
        }

        .hero-buttons {
            display: flex;
            gap: 1rem;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
        }

        .hero-buttons .btn-primary {
            background: white;
            color: #764ba2;
        }

        .hero-buttons .btn-primary:hover {
            background: #f8f8f8;
        }

        .hero-stats {
            display: flex;
            gap: 2rem;
            margin-top: 3rem;
        }

        .stat {
            text-align: center;
        }

        .stat-number {
            font-size: 2rem;
            font-weight: 800;
        }

        .stat-label {
            font-size: 0.875rem;
            opacity: 0.8;
        }

        /* Mockup */
        .hero-mockup {
            position: relative;
        }

        .mockup-container {
            background: white;
            border-radius: 30px;
            padding: 1rem;
            box-shadow: 0 30px 60px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
            transform: perspective(1000px) rotateY(-10deg) rotateX(5deg);
            transition: transform 0.5s ease;
        }

        .mockup-container:hover {
            transform: perspective(1000px) rotateY(-5deg) rotateX(2deg);
        }

        .mockup-screen {
            background: linear-gradient(180deg, #f8f9fa 0%, #e9ecef 100%);
            border-radius: 20px;
            height: 500px;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
        }

        .mockup-header {
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            right: 0;
            height: 60px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%);
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            color: white;
            font-weight: 600;
        }

        .mockup-content {
            padding: 2rem;
            text-align: center;
        }

        .mockup-cards {
            display: flex;
            gap: 1rem;
            margin-top: 80px;
        }

        .mockup-card {
            width: 120px;
            height: 160px;
            background: white;
            border-radius: 15px;
            box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            padding: 1rem;
        }

        .mockup-avatar {
            width: 60px;
            height: 60px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #f093fb 100%);
            margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
        }

        .mockup-name {
            font-weight: 600;
            font-size: 0.875rem;
            color: #1a1a2e;
        }

        .mockup-age {
            font-size: 0.75rem;
            color: #6b7280;
        }

        /* Features Section */
        .features {
            padding: 6rem 2rem;
            background: #fafbfc;
        }

        .section-container {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
        }

        .section-header {
            text-align: center;
            margin-bottom: 4rem;
        }

        .section-badge {
            display: inline-block;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.1) 0%, rgba(118, 75, 162, 0.1) 100%);
            color: #764ba2;
            padding: 0.5rem 1rem;
            border-radius: 50px;
            font-size: 0.875rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
        }

        .section-title {
            font-size: 2.5rem;
            font-weight: 800;
            color: #1a1a2e;
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
        }

        .section-subtitle {
            font-size: 1.125rem;
            color: #6b7280;
            max-width: 600px;
            margin: 0 auto;
        }

        .features-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
            gap: 2rem;
        }

        .feature-card {
            background: white;
            border-radius: 20px;
            padding: 2rem;
            box-shadow: 0 10px 40px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            border: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);
        }

        .feature-card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-5px);
            box-shadow: 0 20px 60px rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.15);
        }

        .feature-icon {
            width: 60px;
            height: 60px;
            border-radius: 15px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%);
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
            font-size: 1.5rem;
        }

        .feature-card h3 {
            font-size: 1.25rem;
            font-weight: 700;
            margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
            color: #1a1a2e;
        }

        .feature-card p {
            color: #6b7280;
            font-size: 0.95rem;
        }

        /* Why Choose Section */
        .why-choose {
            padding: 6rem 2rem;
            background: white;
        }

        .why-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
            gap: 4rem;
            align-items: center;
        }

        .why-content h2 {
            font-size: 2.5rem;
            font-weight: 800;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
            color: #1a1a2e;
        }

        .why-content p {
            color: #6b7280;
            margin-bottom: 2rem;
            font-size: 1.1rem;
        }

        .why-list {
            list-style: none;
        }

        .why-list li {
            display: flex;
            align-items: flex-start;
            gap: 1rem;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
        }

        .why-check {
            width: 24px;
            height: 24px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%);
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            flex-shrink: 0;
            color: white;
            font-size: 0.75rem;
        }

        .why-list li span {
            color: #4a4a6a;
            font-weight: 500;
        }

        .why-image {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 50%, #f093fb 100%);
            border-radius: 30px;
            height: 500px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
        }

        .why-image::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            inset: 20px;
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            border-radius: 20px;
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
        }

        .why-image-text {
            position: relative;
            color: white;
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-align: center;
            padding: 2rem;
        }

        /* Pricing Section */
        .pricing {
            padding: 6rem 2rem;
            background: linear-gradient(180deg, #fafbfc 0%, white 100%);
        }

        .pricing-card {
            max-width: 600px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            background: white;
            border-radius: 30px;
            padding: 3rem;
            box-shadow: 0 30px 60px rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.15);
            border: 2px solid transparent;
            background-image: linear-gradient(white, white), linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%);
            background-origin: border-box;
            background-clip: padding-box, border-box;
            text-align: center;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
        }

        .pricing-badge {
            position: absolute;
            top: 20px;
            right: -35px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%);
            color: white;
            padding: 0.5rem 3rem;
            font-size: 0.75rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            transform: rotate(45deg);
        }

        .pricing-header {
            margin-bottom: 2rem;
        }

        .pricing-header h3 {
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            font-weight: 700;
            color: #1a1a2e;
            margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
        }

        .pricing-header p {
            color: #6b7280;
        }

        .price {
            margin-bottom: 2rem;
        }

        .price-amount {
            font-size: 4rem;
            font-weight: 800;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%);
            -webkit-background-clip: text;
            -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
            background-clip: text;
        }

        .price-term {
            font-size: 1.25rem;
            color: #6b7280;
        }

        .pricing-features {
            list-style: none;
            text-align: left;
            margin-bottom: 2rem;
        }

        .pricing-features li {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 0.75rem;
            padding: 0.75rem 0;
            border-bottom: 1px solid #f0f0f0;
            color: #4a4a6a;
        }

        .pricing-features li:last-child {
            border-bottom: none;
        }

        .pricing-features .check {
            color: #667eea;
            font-weight: bold;
        }

        .pricing-cta {
            width: 100%;
        }

        .guarantee {
            margin-top: 1.5rem;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            gap: 0.5rem;
            color: #6b7280;
            font-size: 0.875rem;
        }

        /* Testimonials */
        .testimonials {
            padding: 6rem 2rem;
            background: white;
        }

        .testimonials-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
            gap: 2rem;
        }

        .testimonial-card {
            background: #fafbfc;
            border-radius: 20px;
            padding: 2rem;
            position: relative;
        }

        .testimonial-quote {
            font-size: 3rem;
            color: #667eea;
            opacity: 0.3;
            position: absolute;
            top: 1rem;
            left: 1.5rem;
            font-family: Georgia, serif;
        }

        .testimonial-text {
            color: #4a4a6a;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
            margin-top: 1.5rem;
            font-style: italic;
        }

        .testimonial-author {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 1rem;
        }

        .testimonial-avatar {
            width: 50px;
            height: 50px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #f093fb 100%);
        }

        .testimonial-info h4 {
            font-weight: 600;
            color: #1a1a2e;
        }

        .testimonial-info p {
            font-size: 0.875rem;
            color: #6b7280;
        }

        /* Tech Stack */
        .tech-stack {
            padding: 4rem 2rem;
            background: #1a1a2e;
            color: white;
        }

        .tech-container {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            text-align: center;
        }

        .tech-stack h3 {
            font-size: 1.25rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            margin-bottom: 2rem;
            opacity: 0.8;
        }

        .tech-logos {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 3rem;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
        }

        .tech-logo {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            padding: 1rem 2rem;
            border-radius: 10px;
            font-weight: 600;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
        }

        /* CTA Section */
        .cta {
            padding: 6rem 2rem;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 50%, #f093fb 100%);
            text-align: center;
            color: white;
        }

        .cta h2 {
            font-size: 3rem;
            font-weight: 800;
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
        }

        .cta p {
            font-size: 1.25rem;
            opacity: 0.9;
            margin-bottom: 2rem;
            max-width: 600px;
            margin-left: auto;
            margin-right: auto;
        }

        .cta .btn-primary {
            background: white;
            color: #764ba2;
        }

        .cta .btn-primary:hover {
            background: #f8f8f8;
        }

        /* FAQ Section */
        .faq {
            padding: 6rem 2rem;
            background: #fafbfc;
        }

        .faq-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
            gap: 2rem;
            max-width: 900px;
            margin: 0 auto;
        }

        .faq-item {
            background: white;
            border-radius: 15px;
            padding: 1.5rem;
            box-shadow: 0 5px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);
        }

        .faq-item h4 {
            font-weight: 600;
            color: #1a1a2e;
            margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
        }

        .faq-item p {
            color: #6b7280;
            font-size: 0.95rem;
        }

        /* Footer */
        .footer {
            padding: 4rem 2rem 2rem;
            background: #1a1a2e;
            color: white;
        }

        .footer-container {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 2fr 1fr 1fr 1fr;
            gap: 3rem;
        }

        .footer-brand .logo {
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
        }

        .footer-brand p {
            color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.6);
            font-size: 0.95rem;
        }

        .footer-column h4 {
            font-weight: 600;
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
        }

        .footer-column ul {
            list-style: none;
        }

        .footer-column ul li {
            margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
        }

        .footer-column ul a {
            color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.6);
            text-decoration: none;
            transition: color 0.3s ease;
        }

        .footer-column ul a:hover {
            color: white;
        }

        .footer-bottom {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 3rem auto 0;
            padding-top: 2rem;
            border-top: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
            color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.6);
            font-size: 0.875rem;
        }

        /* Responsive */
        @media (max-width: 1024px) {
            .hero-container {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
                text-align: center;
            }

            .hero h1 {
                font-size: 2.5rem;
            }

            .hero p {
                margin: 0 auto 2rem;
            }

            .hero-buttons {
                justify-content: center;
            }

            .hero-stats {
                justify-content: center;
            }

            .hero-mockup {
                display: none;
            }

            .features-grid {
                grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
            }

            .why-grid {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            }

            .testimonials-grid {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            }

            .footer-container {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
            }
        }

        @media (max-width: 768px) {
            .nav-links {
                display: none;
            }

            .hero {
                padding: 6rem 1.5rem 3rem;
            }

            .hero h1 {
                font-size: 2rem;
            }

            .features-grid {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            }

            .faq-grid {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            }

            .footer-container {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            }

            .footer-bottom {
                flex-direction: column;
                gap: 1rem;
                text-align: center;
            }

            .cta h2 {
                font-size: 2rem;
            }
        }

        /* Animations */
        @keyframes float {
            0%, 100% { transform: translateY(0); }
            50% { transform: translateY(-10px); }
        }

        .floating {
            animation: float 3s ease-in-out infinite;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <!-- Navigation -->
    <nav class="nav">
        <div class="nav-container">
            <div class="logo">LoveLaunch</div>
            <div class="nav-links">
                <a href="#features">Features</a>
                <a href="#pricing">Pricing</a>
                <a href="#testimonials">Testimonials</a>
                <a href="#faq">FAQ</a>
                <a href="https://aisolns.com" class="btn btn-primary">Get Started</a>
            </div>
        </div>
    </nav>

    <!-- Hero Section -->
    <section class="hero">
        <div class="hero-container">
            <div class="hero-content">
                <span class="hero-badge">Available on AI Solutions Store</span>
                <h1>Launch Your Own Dating Platform in Days</h1>
                <p>Complete white-label dating solution with AI-powered matching, real-time chat, and payment processing. Everything you need to start your dating empire.</p>
                <div class="hero-buttons">
                    <a href="https://aisolns.com" class="btn btn-primary btn-large">Buy Now - $2,499</a>
                    <a href="#features" class="btn btn-secondary btn-large">See Features</a>
                </div>
                <div class="hero-stats">
                    <div class="stat">
                        <div class="stat-number">100%</div>
                        <div class="stat-label">White-Label</div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="stat">
                        <div class="stat-number">24/7</div>
                        <div class="stat-label">AI Support</div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="stat">
                        <div class="stat-number">1-Click</div>
                        <div class="stat-label">Deploy</div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="hero-mockup">
                <div class="mockup-container floating">
                    <div class="mockup-screen">
                        <div class="mockup-header">Your Dating App</div>
                        <div class="mockup-cards">
                            <div class="mockup-card">
                                <div class="mockup-avatar"></div>
                                <div class="mockup-name">Sarah, 28</div>
                                <div class="mockup-age">2 miles away</div>
                            </div>
                            <div class="mockup-card" style="transform: translateY(-20px);">
                                <div class="mockup-avatar"></div>
                                <div class="mockup-name">Mike, 31</div>
                                <div class="mockup-age">5 miles away</div>
                            </div>
                            <div class="mockup-card">
                                <div class="mockup-avatar"></div>
                                <div class="mockup-name">Emma, 26</div>
                                <div class="mockup-age">1 mile away</div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- Features Section -->
    <section class="features" id="features">
        <div class="section-container">
            <div class="section-header">

## Email 2: Mastering the AI Matching System

**Subject Line Options:**
- The Secret Sauce: How Our AI Matching Works
- Your Users Will Love This Feature
- AI Matching Deep Dive (Don't Skip This)

**Send:** 24 hours after Email 1

---

### Email Body

**Preview Text:** This is what makes your platform stand out from generic dating apps.

---

Hi {{first_name}},

Let's talk about what makes your platform special: the AI-powered matching system.

This isn't just a "random shuffle" algorithm. It's designed to create meaningful connections that keep users engaged and coming back.

**How It Works:**

**1. Preference Analysis**
When users set their preferences, the system creates a weighted compatibility profile. It's not just about checking boxes - it understands nuance.

**2. Behavioral Learning**
Every swipe, message, and interaction teaches the algorithm. It learns what each user actually wants, not just what they say they want.

**3. Compatibility Scoring**
Each potential match gets a multi-factor compatibility score based on:
- Stated preferences
- Behavioral patterns
- Response likelihood
- Conversation potential

**4. Smart Queuing**
High-compatibility matches surface first. This increases match rates, boosts confidence, and improves retention.

**How to Customize It:**

The matching algorithm is fully configurable. You can:
- Adjust weighting factors in the config
- Add custom compatibility criteria
- Implement location-based modifications
- Create VIP matching tiers for premium users

Check out `/docs/matching-algorithm.md` for the complete technical breakdown.

**Pro Tip:** Many successful platform owners create niche-specific matching criteria. If you're targeting book lovers, you might weight reading preferences higher. Fitness enthusiasts? Activity level becomes crucial.

Your algorithm. Your rules.

Tomorrow, we'll cover monetization strategies that are working for other platform owners.

Best,

The LoveLaunch Team

P.S. The AI assistant powered by Llama is equally customizable. Check `/docs/llama-integration.md` for details on tailoring it to your audience.

**Subject Line Options:**

**Send:** 48 hours after Email 2

### Email Body

**Preview Text:** Real monetization strategies from real platform owners.

---

Hi {{first_name}},

Let's talk money.

You've got the platform. You've got the AI matching. Now let's talk about turning users into revenue.

**Here's what's working for other platform owners:**

---

**Strategy 1: Tiered Subscriptions**

The classic model, and it works for a reason.

| Tier | Price | Features |
|------|-------|----------|
| Free | $0 | Limited swipes, basic matching |
| Plus | $14.99/mo | Unlimited swipes, see who likes you |
| Premium | $29.99/mo | Priority matching, read receipts, AI conversation help |

**Why it works:** The free tier builds your user base. Plus captures casual users. Premium attracts serious daters willing to pay for results.

**Implementation:** Already built into your Stripe integration. See `/docs/subscriptions.md`.

---

**Strategy 2: Boost Credits**

Let users pay to get more visibility.

- Profile Boost: $4.99 (30 minutes of priority placement)
- Super Like Pack: $9.99 (5 super likes)
- Weekly Spotlight: $14.99 (featured in weekly recommendations)

**Why it works:** Low friction purchases. Users buy when they're motivated (just matched with someone great, or frustrated with low visibility).

**Implementation:** One-time Stripe payments are pre-configured. See `/docs/credits.md`.

---

**Strategy 3: Premium Features**

Monetize specific features:

- **See Who Liked You:** $9.99/month
- **Unlimited Rewinds:** $4.99/month
- **Incognito Mode:** $6.99/month
- **AI Message Assistant:** $7.99/month

**Why it works:** Users pay for exactly what they value. Lower barrier than full subscription.

---

**Strategy 4: Verified Badges**

Charge for identity verification (and provide real value).

- Photo Verification: $4.99 (one-time)
- Identity Verification: $14.99 (one-time)
- Background Check Badge: $29.99 (one-time)

**Why it works:** Safety-conscious users will pay. It builds trust on your platform. Win-win.

---

**The Numbers That Matter:**

Track these metrics in your admin dashboard:
- **ARPU** (Average Revenue Per User): Industry average is $15-20
- **Conversion Rate** (Free to Paid): Target 5-10%
- **Churn Rate**: Keep below 10% monthly
- **LTV** (Lifetime Value): Aim for 6+ months retention

---

**Your Homework:**

1. Decide on your initial pricing structure
2. Configure Stripe products (we've included templates)
3. Set up your subscription tiers in the admin panel
4. Launch with a promotional offer to build momentum

You have everything you need. Now execute.

Questions? Hit reply anytime.

To your profitable future,

The LoveLaunch Team

P.S. We're always adding new features based on customer feedback. Got an idea? Let us know. Your success is our success.

Hi {{first_name}},

Let's talk about what makes your platform special: the AI-powered matching system.

This isn't just a "random shuffle" algorithm. It's designed to create meaningful connections that keep users engaged and coming back.

**How It Works:**

**1. Preference Analysis**
When users set their preferences, the system creates a weighted compatibility profile. It's not just about checking boxes - it understands nuance.

**2. Behavioral Learning**
Every swipe, message, and interaction teaches the algorithm. It learns what each user actually wants, not just what they say they want.

**3. Compatibility Scoring**
Each potential match gets a multi-factor compatibility score based on:
- Stated preferences
- Behavioral patterns
- Response likelihood
- Conversation potential

**4. Smart Queuing**
High-compatibility matches surface first. This increases match rates, boosts confidence, and improves retention.

**How to Customize It:**

The matching algorithm is fully configurable. You can:
- Adjust weighting factors in the config
- Add custom compatibility criteria
- Implement location-based modifications
- Create VIP matching tiers for premium users

Check out `/docs/matching-algorithm.md` for the complete technical breakdown.

**Pro Tip:** Many successful platform owners create niche-specific matching criteria. If you're targeting book lovers, you might weight reading preferences higher. Fitness enthusiasts? Activity level becomes crucial.

Your algorithm. Your rules.

Tomorrow, we'll cover monetization strategies that are working for other platform owners.

Best,

The LoveLaunch Team

P.S. The AI assistant powered by Llama is equally customizable. Check `/docs/llama-integration.md` for details on tailoring it to your audience.

### Email Body

**Preview Text:** Real monetization strategies from real platform owners.

---

Hi {{first_name}},

Let's talk money.

You've got the platform. You've got the AI matching. Now let's talk about turning users into revenue.

**Here's what's working for other platform owners:**

---

**Strategy 1: Tiered Subscriptions**

The classic model, and it works for a reason.

| Tier | Price | Features |
|------|-------|----------|
| Free | $0 | Limited swipes, basic matching |
| Plus | $14.99/mo | Unlimited swipes, see who likes you |
| Premium | $29.99/mo | Priority matching, read receipts, AI conversation help |

**Why it works:** The free tier builds your user base. Plus captures casual users. Premium attracts serious daters willing to pay for results.

**Implementation:** Already built into your Stripe integration. See `/docs/subscriptions.md`.

---

**Strategy 2: Boost Credits**

Let users pay to get more visibility.

- Profile Boost: $4.99 (30 minutes of priority placement)
- Super Like Pack: $9.99 (5 super likes)
- Weekly Spotlight: $14.99 (featured in weekly recommendations)

**Why it works:** Low friction purchases. Users buy when they're motivated (just matched with someone great, or frustrated with low visibility).

**Implementation:** One-time Stripe payments are pre-configured. See `/docs/credits.md`.

---

**Strategy 3: Premium Features**

Monetize specific features:

- **See Who Liked You:** $9.99/month
- **Unlimited Rewinds:** $4.99/month
- **Incognito Mode:** $6.99/month
- **AI Message Assistant:** $7.99/month

**Why it works:** Users pay for exactly what they value. Lower barrier than full subscription.

---

**Strategy 4: Verified Badges**

Charge for identity verification (and provide real value).

- Photo Verification: $4.99 (one-time)
- Identity Verification: $14.99 (one-time)
- Background Check Badge: $29.99 (one-time)

**Why it works:** Safety-conscious users will pay. It builds trust on your platform. Win-win.

---

**The Numbers That Matter:**

Track these metrics in your admin dashboard:
- **ARPU** (Average Revenue Per User): Industry average is $15-20
- **Conversion Rate** (Free to Paid): Target 5-10%
- **Churn Rate**: Keep below 10% monthly
- **LTV** (Lifetime Value): Aim for 6+ months retention

---

**Your Homework:**

1. Decide on your initial pricing structure
2. Configure Stripe products (we've included templates)
3. Set up your subscription tiers in the admin panel
4. Launch with a promotional offer to build momentum

You have everything you need. Now execute.

Questions? Hit reply anytime.

To your profitable future,

The LoveLaunch Team

P.S. We're always adding new features based on customer feedback. Got an idea? Let us know. Your success is our success.

---
